title: Drawing, "A mountainous landscape", 1763
medium: Brush and watercolor, pen on paper
inscribed: At bottom right in pen:  "J B H  1763"
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Horizontal drawing os two peasants on a road, at left, with a clock of sheep and a donkey.  The younger of the men carries a bundle upon his right shoulder.  At right, in the forground, is water, and a village in the middle plane.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "A mountainous landscape", 1763.
1763. Brush and watercolor, pen on paper. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1931-64-176.
